properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V HAWK EXPLORER TOWING
   5.4 MILE LONG CABLE:
   A. 03 MAR ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      01-54.23S 038-54.22W AND 03-01.27S 037-25.62W.
   B. 04 MAR ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      01-15.40S 039-32.58W AND 02-56.93S 037-22.37W.
   C. 05 MAR ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      01-29.15S 039-32.37W AND 03-05.58S 037-28.88W.
   D. 06 MAR ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      01-43.70S 038-47.55W AND 02-52.60S 037-19.12W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 470/12.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 07 MAR.
